column3: was a Hobbits of the Shire.

column1: Esmeralda was the youngest of the five children of Adalgrim Took. She married Saradoc Brandybuck
column2: making her Mistress of Buckland and of Brandy Hall.  She and Saradoc had one child
column3: Meriadoc Brandybuck. As she was the younger sister of Thain Paladin Took II
column6: was first cousins with the Thains children: Peregrin Took and his sisters

column1: She attended the Bilbos Farewell Party of Bilbo Baggins in  with her family.
Wiktionary:Esmeralda is the Spanish word for "Wikipedia:Emerald".Jim Allan (ed.)
